About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

A 31 years old Arab/Portugese/Indian Software Engineer and self taught UX/UI Designer and Web Developer. My background howeverhas always been design-driven; ever since I created my first website at the age of 15 Iâ€™ve always been excited with the idea of crafting something that people can interact with. I went on to study an Software Engineer career because I believe great products are more than just good ideas carefully executed through good design. Software still is and will always be the engine powering them. Great web design without functionality is like a sports car with no engine., said Paul Cookson once. I truly enjoy crafting digital experiences; whether that is handling the UX/UI design, leading the software development by example or managing the entire project.
